name: Cinetrone 4K Laser Projector
product_description: Experience breathtaking clarity and vibrant colors with the Cinetrone 4K Laser Projector. Its advanced laser light source ensures a long-lasting, maintenance-free cinematic experience.

name: Aura Atmos 7.1.4 Soundbar
product_description: Immerse yourself in three-dimensional sound with the Aura Atmos Soundbar. Featuring up-firing speakers and a powerful wireless subwoofer for a truly holographic audio experience.

name: Studio Reference Bookshelf Speakers (Pair)
product_description: For the discerning audiophile, our Studio Reference speakers deliver unparalleled accuracy and detail, reproducing music and soundtracks exactly as the artist intended.

name: Nexus 9.2 Channel AV Receiver
product_description: The Nexus 9.2 is the heart of your high-performance home theater, with cutting-edge video processing and support for all major 3D audio formats.

name: AcousticPro 120" 16:9 Projector Screen
product_description: The acoustically transparent material allows you to place speakers directly behind the screen for a truly immersive and clean setup, while the 1.1 gain surface ensures a bright, color-accurate image.
